actions.text: Amendment SA 3541 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3541 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kohl. (consideration: CR S7382; text: CR S7382) To ensure the availability of sufficient fiscal year 2004 funding for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership program of the National Institute of Standards and Technology.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3541 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3541 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Kohl.

purpose: To ensure the availability of sufficient fiscal year 2004 funding for the Manufacturing Extension Partnership program of the National Institute of Standards and Technology.
